```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(writexl)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

complaints <- readRDS("/Users/michaelgraham-green/Downloads/complaints.rds")

complaints_NE <- complaints %>% 
  filter(product == 'Student loan', state == c('MA', 'ME', 'NH', 'VT', 'CT', 'RI'))
```

    geom_point())
